casebody.data:

v.
Marc HARRIS; Jeff Mackinen; Jerry Alexander; Marty Cohen ; Charles Delle Donne; Richard Scott Elder; Arnie Gettelson; Jerry Hollander; Elias Kasouf; Don Marshall; Jerry Mcdonald; Ron Melanson; Ken Miles ; Marvin Mills; Marc Morin; Robert Parker; Dennis Poulsen ; Ron Smith; Andrew Tanner ; Craig Tiefenthaler; Virginia Wallace ; and Gerald Wolfe, Respondents. No. 75370 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JULY 24, 2019

AFFIRMED.
